original_title: Trans-Siberian Orchestra: Christmas Eve and Other Stories Live in Concert
overview: Although this is the first holiday season in over twenty years that Trans-Siberian Orchestra isn’t touring – and we’ll miss seeing each of you out on the road –  we’re excited to keep the TSO tradition alive in a new way through this 90-minute livestream special.
title: Trans-Siberian Orchestra: Christmas Eve and Other Stories Live in Concert
